sent.orig: Singer and his colleagues a model to predict the resulting concentrations in rivers.
sent.trans: Singer及其同事建立模型来检测河流中化合物浓度结果。

sent.orig: The morphological relation between "sing" and "singer" and "song" is derivational.
sent.trans: 从形态关系上看，“sing”、“singer”和“song”都是由同一个词派生出来的。

sent.orig: Objective:To investigate the indication,techniques and reasons of failure of the Blom Singer technique for voice restoration.
sent.trans: 目的 ：探讨期 Blom- Singer发音重建术的适应证、相关的技术要点以及失败的原因。

sent.orig: Objective To study the method and content of health education to patients accepted Blom-Singer voice reconstruction.
sent.trans: 目的探讨Blom鄄Singer发音重建术病人的健康教育方法和内容。

sent.orig: By the way, Aaron changed to be strength singer form idol singer!
sent.trans: 顺道一提，此时的大哥也从偶像派歌手跳脱成为实力派的唱将唷！
